Product Safety GasCookery takes product safety very seriously. All our gas stoves are designed and manufactured in compliance with the relevant safety standards and regulations in India. However, it is important to note that the use of gas stoves involves certain risks and hazards, such as fire, explosion, and carbon monoxide poisoning. Therefore, we strongly recommend that you follow the safety instructions and guidelines provided with our products and take all necessary precautions while using them. pages.privacy-policy: GasCookery Privacy Policy | Comprehensive Information on How We Protect Your Privacy GasCookery Home Why are we Quality Range Services Premium quality Privacy Policy Data Protection GasCookery is devoted to protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of any personal information received from you. We strictly adhere to the requirements of the data protection legislation in India, and we are registered on the Data Protection Public Register. The purpose of this statement is to explain to you what personal information we collect and how we may use it. When you order, we need to know your name, email address, delivery address, credit or debit card number, and card expiry date. This allows us to process and fulfill your order. You have the option to withhold personal information that is not required for the order process. We use your personal information to update you about new products/services and special offers. We will only contact you with your consent. You are free to opt out of hearing from us by email, post, or phone at any time. We do not sell, rent or exchange your personal information with any third party for commercial reasons, beyond the essential requirement for credit/debit card validation during the purchase process. We follow strict security procedures in the storage and disclosure of information which you have given us, to prevent unauthorized access in accordance with the data protection legislation in India. We do not collect sensitive information about you except when you specifically and knowingly provide it. We will not transfer your information outside India without first obtaining your consent. In order to process credit/debit card transactions, the bank or card processing agency may require verifying your personal details for authorization outside India. Your information will not be transferred out of our control for any other purpose. Cookies Cookies are small text files that websites send to your computer. A cookie can be thought of as an Internet user's identification card. They let the website know when the user has returned. This allows the site to bring up information relevant to that user, for example, your name, past orders, etc. Cookies make the interaction between users and websites faster and easier. Without cookies, it would be very difficult for a website to allow a visitor to fill up a shopping cart or to remember the user's preferences or registration details for a future visit. The GasCookery website uses cookies to allow customers to move from one part of the web site to another and to add items to the shopping basket without having to login repeatedly. We also use cookies to track visitors' interest in our products. We may use this to understand what most appeals to our customers so we can make our offers as appropriate as possible. Browsing behavior is also used to create relevant banner advertising with product recommendations. By using our website, you agree that we can place these types of cookies on your device. If you want to delete any cookies that are already on your computer, please refer to the help and support area on your internet browser for instructions on how to locate the file or directory that stores cookies. Third-Party Services In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us. Questions and Contact Information If you would like to access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information, contact us at gascookery@gmail.com. GasCookery © 2024 GasCookery. All Rights Reserved.
